stories.text:
Everyone I know seems to be in love with Cloudflare, and then sporadically, we have issues like Cloudbleed, reported data leaks, and severe outages that simply take your site down just for using them.

Is CF overrated, or worth the occasional blips? What can I do to minimize downtime? Are there good alternatives?
stories.title: Ask HN: Alternatives to Cloudflare?
Strava app flaw revealed runs of Israeli officials at secretive bases

stories.text: I've been a long-time user of the encrypted git Keybase provides. Although reliable, it is slow. Also there hasn't been much development on any front since Zoom bought them either. Are there any alternatives for having hosted e2ee full-repo (not just single files) clones? Or perhaps alternatives for achieving the same effect?
stories.title: Ask HN: Alternative for Keybase's end-to-end-encrypted Git?
